en: I've been looking at some statistics and I'm a bit worried - we are not retaining our beta-testers.

I've narrowed it down to two different possibilities. We could simplify the interface so it's easier to use (which would cost a bit), or we could ramp up our alarms and alerts if we detect it hasn't been used for a while (a cheap fix). What do you think?
Yes, good. I think you made the right choice. That should pay off in the future.
All right. We'll do that. I just hope it won't annoy our customers too much!
